name: s2member Secure File Uploader
author: Lew Ayotte

sections.description:
You must have the s2member Membership Plugin installed and activated to use this plugin.

This simple plugin that allows you to upload a file to the s2member-files/ secure directory and automatically insert it into your post.

This plugin was requested by a client, who would only pay for 5 hours worth of work. The plugin could use some polishing and maybe some extra GUI love, but it does what the cliented wanted at the time. Because I feel like it could use some improvements, I’m releasing it as version 0.0.1.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload s2member-secure-file-uploader directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Do I need s2member to use this plugin?

Yes

short_description: A s2member add-on that allows you to upload a file to the s2member-files/ secure directory and automatically insert a link into your post.
